00389           @Override
00390           public boolean onOptionsItemSelected(MenuItem item) {
00391             switch (item.getItemId()) {
00392             case R.id.call:
00393               Toast.makeText(this, "Calling...", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT)
00394                   .show();
00395                 phone = "tel:" + phone;
00396                         Intent callIntent = new Intent(
00397                                         Intent.ACTION_CALL);
00398                         callIntent.setData(Uri.parse(phone));
00399                         startActivity(callIntent);
00400               break;
00401             case R.id.map:
00402               Toast.makeText(this, "Mapping...", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT)
00403                   .show();
00404                 mapping();
00405               break;
00406             case R.id.navig:
00407                 Intent intent = new Intent(
00408                                         Intent.ACTION_VIEW,
00409                                         Uri.parse("google.navigation:q="
00410                                                         + placeDetails.result.geometry.location.lat
00411                                                         + ","
00412                                                         + placeDetails.result.geometry.location.lng));
00413                         intent.addFlags(Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK);
00414                         startActivity(intent);
00415         break;
00416 
00417 
00418             default:
00419               break;
00420             }
00421 
00422             return true;
00423           }

00465         public void getImage(){
00466                 
00467                  // Array of references of the photos
00468         PlacePhoto[] photos = PlaceParcel.mPhotos;
00469 
00470 
00471                 
00472                  // Creating an array of ImageDownloadTask to download photos
00473         ImageDownloadTask[] imageDownloadTask = new ImageDownloadTask[photos.length];
00474 
00475         int width = 90;
00476         int height = 90;
00477 
00478         String url = "https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/place/photo?";
00479         String key = "key=AIzaSyAYlKYeI7SYOWMYmuYSu534-ESCeHldmd8";
00480         String sensor = "sensor=true";
00481         String maxWidth="maxwidth=" + width;
00482         String maxHeight = "maxheight=" + height;
00483         url = url + "&" + key + "&" + sensor + "&" + maxWidth + "&" + maxHeight;
00484 
00485         // Traversing through all the photoreferences
00486         for(int i=0;i<photos.length;i++){
00487             // Creating a task to download i-th photo
00488             imageDownloadTask[i] = new ImageDownloadTask();
00489 
00490             String photoReference = "photoreference="+photos[i].mPhotoReference;
00491 
00492             // URL for downloading the photo from Google Services
00493             url = url + "&" + photoReference;
00494 
00495             // Downloading i-th photo from the above url
00496             imageDownloadTask[i].execute(url);
00497         }
00498                 
00499         }//end getimage

00504 
00505 class ImageDownloadTask extends AsyncTask<String, Integer, Bitmap>{
00506     Bitmap bitmap = null;
00507     @Override
00508     protected Bitmap doInBackground(String... url) {
00509         try{
00510             // Starting image download
00511             bitmap = downloadImage(url[0]);
00512         }catch(Exception e){
00513             Log.d("Background Task",e.toString());
00514         }
00515         return bitmap;
00516     }
00517 
00518 
00519     
00520     public static Bitmap downloadImage(String strUrl) throws IOException{
00521         Bitmap bitmap=null;
00522         InputStream iStream = null;
00523         try{
00524             URL url = new URL(strUrl);
00525  
00527             HttpURLConnection urlConnection = (HttpURLConnection) url.openConnection();
00528  
00530             urlConnection.connect();
00531  
00533             iStream = urlConnection.getInputStream();
00534  
00536             bitmap = BitmapFactory.decodeStream(iStream);
00537  
00538         }catch(Exception e){
00539             Log.d("Exception while downloading url", e.toString());
00540         }finally{
00541             iStream.close();
00542         }
00543         return bitmap;
00544     }
00545 }
